dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-radical-utils
dependent_to.description: Shared code and tools for various RADICAL Projects

dependent_to.name: py-py2neo
dependent_to.description:
Py2neo is a client library and toolkit for working with Neo4j from
within Python applications and from the command line.

dependent_to.name: py-bandit
dependent_to.description: Security oriented static analyser for python code.

dependent_to.name: awscli
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-rbtools
dependent_to.description:
RBTools is a set of command line tools and a rich Python API for use
with Review Board.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-typesentry
dependent_to.description: Python library for run-time type checking for type-annotated functions.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-cpp
dependent_to.description: Use pytest runner to discover and execute C++ tests.

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the ML
ecosystem.

dependent_to.name: py-isort
dependent_to.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependent_to.name: py-rich
dependent_to.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools Core Module.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: py-workload-automation

Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.
